PRODUCT DESCRIPTION (Max 200 characters: The Citi Prestige card is your passport to a world of unforgettable experiences. It is a lifestyle choice that lets you make the most of every moment and turn it into something extraordinary. We're inviting you to live a dream and create new memories.

$1 = 2 pts dom /  5 pts int

Singapore Airlines & Velocity : 1.5 Citi Rewards points = 1 airline mile
Asia Miles: 2 Citi Rewards points = 1 Asia Mile
Emirates Skywards Miles: 2.5 Citibank reward points = 1 Skyward Mile

'-VISA Infinite Privileges:
'-- Stay for 3 nights and get 4th night free at 900 hotels.
'-- 15% off first and business class with participating airlines
'--Airport Meet & Assist and LIMO

INTEREST RATE TERMS AND CONDITIONS: The maximum 55 days interest free period applies when you pay your balance off in full for two consecutive months. If you carry a balance on your credit card from month to month, the 55 days interest free period does not apply and you are charged interest once you make a purchase. No interest free period is available on Cash Advances or Balance Transfers.
REWARDS TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
You have the choice of earning 70,000 Citibank reward points or 70,000 Qantas Frequent Flyer points (if you enrol in the Citibank Qantas Rewards Program for an additional annual fee of $49 at the time of approval) when you first spend on your card within three months of card approval.All Rewards are subject to the terms and conditions of the Citibank Rewards Program. Citibank reward points never expire as long as your account remains open. Current Citibank Credit Cardholders are not eligible to apply for this introductory offer. Offer ends 31 December 2015.

Citibank Rewards and Citibank Qantas Rewards are two separate programs. Unless you choose the Citibank Qantas Rewards program (for an annual fee of $49), you will be automatically be enrolled in the Citibank Rewards Program. Under the Citibank Rewards program you will earn two rewards points for every per dollar spent. Citibank Rewards Points are subject to the Citibank Reward Terms and Conditions. Under the Citibank Qantas Rewards Program you will earn one Qantas Frequent Flyer point per dollar of eligible spend. Once Qantas Frequent Flyer points have been transferred to your Qantas Frequent Flyer account, they cannot be reversed. Qantas Frequent Flyer points are earned in accordance with the Citibank Qantas Rewards Program Terms and Conditionsand you must be a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program in order to earn or redeem Qantas Frequent Flyer points. A joining fee applies. Qantas FrequentFlyer points and membership are subject to the Qantas Frequent Flyer program Terms and Conditions. Full details are available at qantas.com/frequentflyer. Enrolment in the Citibank Qantas Rewards program can be requested on card activation or after approval of new card by contacting Citibank on 1800 818 008.

All rewards are subjected to the Terms and Conditions of the Citibank Rewards Program. Cash advances do not earn Reward points. Different Rewards points earn rates apply to cardholders who enrol in airline frequent flyer direct earn rewards programs.

You must be a member of the airline and hotel loyalty programs in which you wish to claim airline and hotel loyalty points and have advised us of your airline and hotel loyalty program membership number prior to any such redemption. Membership of an airline and hotel loyalty program willbesubject to the terms and conditions of that program.

The number of Qantas and Partner Classic Award seats is limited. The number of seats available depends on the flight, date, season and destination. Some flights may not have any Classic Award seats available. Award flights must be booked at least 24hours before scheduled departure (and other advance booking requirements may apply). For further information see qantas.com/frequentflyer. Subject to the terms and conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program. Store products are for delivery in Australia and New Zealand only (and different products are available in each delivery location. Redemption points for items through the online store is subject to the terms and conditions (including store terms of use andvoucher terms and conditions. See qantas.com for details.

Citibank Travel Program service call centre is operated by Pinpoint Travel Group Pty Ltd, Licence No.2TA002974. Travel booked via the call centre must be paid in full using the customer's Citi Prestige Credit Card, with a cashback processed to the value of points redeemed. Cashback on customer account may take up to 14 days. Redemption via the Citibank Travel Program call centre is available only to customers enrolled in the Citibank Rewards Program and is not available to cardholders who enrol in airline frequent flyer direct earn rewards programs. All offers are subject to availability and change without notice. Offers may vary according to itinerary options, currency fluctuations and taxes at the time of booking.
BALANCE TRANSFER TERMS AND CONDITIONS: Your total balance transfers may not exceed 80% of your credit limit. The 0% p.a. interest rate applies to balances transferred with this offer at point of application, for a period of 6 months. The 6 month promotional period commences once balance transfer is processed. At the end of the balancetransfer period, the interest rate on any outstanding transferred balance will revert to the variable Annual Percentage Rate for Cash Advances, currently 21.24% p.a. The current variable Annual Percentage Rate for retail purchases is 20.74% p.a. This offer ends 31 December 2015. Current Citibank Credit Cardholders are not eligible to apply for this introductory offer.
OTHER FEATURES TERMS AND CONDITIONS:

An excess applies to Purchase Cover Insurance.

'-One complimentary Priority Pass membership for the primary card holder is a special feature of Citi Prestige. The primary card holder is entitled to unlimited visits to Priority Pass&trade lounges and may bring one guest per visit. Any additional guests will be charged directly by the lounge. The membership is subject to the Priority Pass&trade Conditions of Use available at www.prioritypass.com. Once you have activated your Citi Prestige card please allow up to 15 working days for your Priority Pass&trade card to arrive in the mail. Please note that Priority Pass is not currently available at any Australian airport other than Melbourne International Airport.

'-Citi Prestige Cardholders are entitled to access a range of Visa Infinite privileges. These include hotel and travel discounts andprivileges, golf course green fees, complimentary limousine transfers, shopping and dining benefits. These benefits are provided by Visa and may change from timetotome as determined by Visa. Citibank is not responsible for the provision of such benefits.

INTEREST RATE TERMS AND CONDITIONS: The maximum 55 days interest free period applies when you pay your balance off in full for two consecutive months. REWARDS TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
-To be eligible for the 40,000 bonus Skywards Miles, you must apply for your Emirates Citibank World MasterCard&registered before 31 December 2015 and spend on your card within three months of card approval. Cash advances, balance transfers and special promotions are excluded from this offer. A Cardholder must provide the Emirates Skywards membership number to Citibank for the Skywards Miles transfer to occur. You are required to provide Citibank with your valid Emirates Skywards membership number within six months of your account opening, otherwise your Skywards Miles will be forfeited.
'-An Emirates Citibank World MasterCard&registered cardholder must be a member of the Emirates Skywards frequent flyer program to earn Skywards Miles. Membership is free and subject to Emirates Skywards terms and conditions. Cash Advances, Balance Transfers and Special Promotions are excluded from this offer. Skywards Miles are currently earned at a rate of 1 Skywards Mile for every domestic A$1 spent, 1.5 Skywards Miles for every international $1 spent, and 2 Skywards Miles are earned for every $1 spent on Emirates spend. Emirates spend means airline tickets purchased via emirates.com. A cardholder must provide their Emirates Skywards membership number to Citibank in order for the Skywards Miles transfer to occur. Skywards Miles are transferred to the cardholder's Emirates Skywards account at the end of each statement cycle. Please allow up to 15 days from the end of your statement cycle for Skywards Miles to be credited into your Emirates Skywards account.
'-The Emirates High Street is a rewards program offered by Emirates and subject to the terms and conditions specified by Emirates. For more information, please visit emirateshighstreet.com

At the end of the balance transfer period, the interest rate on any outstanding transferred balance will revert to the variable Annual Percentage Rate or Cash Advances, currently 21.24% p.a.
OTHER FEATURES TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
-Each Emirates Citibank World MasterCard& registered cardholder is automatically provided two complimentary Emirates Lounge Vouchers per year for the Primary Cardholder to access any Emirates Lounge in Australia. To use the vouchers, the Cardholder must have purchased a ticket for an Emirates booked and operated flight and on an Emirates aircraft that they are travelling on with their Emirates Citibank World MasterCard&registered. Entry to the Emirates Lounge in Australia prior to the Emirates flight will be granted upon presentation of a valid voucher for the Cardholder. The second voucher may be used by the Primary Cardholder on a subsequent ticket purchase for travel on an Emirates booked and operated flight and on an Emirates aircraft. Alternatively, it can be used to take along a guest departing on the same flight as the Cardholder and which the Cardholder has paid for the guest's flight ticket with their Emirates Citibank World MasterCard&registered . Emirates Lounge Access Vouchers are not valid on Qantas Flight numbers operated by Emirates, or on any codeshare flights.
'-Chauffeur-driven transfers to and from Australian airports for Emirates Citibank customers travelling in Economy Class on an Emirates operated flight number and aircraft is restricted to once per calendar year on purchasing an Emirates operated  long-haul flight with an Emirates operated flight number and aircraft with your Emirates Citibank World MasterCard&registered by the primary card holder. Maximum capacity per car is 2 adults, with total luggage limit of two suitcases plus one carry-on bag. Additional charges apply if a larger vehicle or infant car seat is required. Excludes Trans-Tasman flights, Skywards Miles redemption tickets, travel industry tickets and group bookings. Mileage restrictions apply for details visit www.emirates.com/au. This service must be booked at least 72 hours prior to departure by calling Emirates on 1300 303 777. The Emirates CitibankWorld MasterCard&registered holder must be travelling on the Emirates operated flight number and aircraft to be eligible for the complimentary chauffer drive service. Chauffeur-drive is provided by Emirates and their authorised third parties to Emirates Citibank World MasterCard&registered Cardholders. Citibank accepts no liability for this service.
'-Complimentary Insurance and Guaranteed Pricing Scheme are provided automatically to cardholders under a master agreement between Zurich Australian Insurance Limited ABN 13 000 296 640, AFSL No. 232507 and Citigroup Pty Limited, and are subject to Terms, Conditions and exclusions available at www.citibank.com.au/complimentaryinsurance. An excess applies to Purchase Cover Insurance.

Privileges cannot be used in conjunction with any other promotional programs or offers. Citibank and the business establishment reserve the right to change the terms and conditions at any time. Refer to www.citiworldprivileges.com for up-to-date offer details.
'-Exclusive offers and discounts supplied by MasterCard. Visit mastercard.com.au/privileges or PricelessSydney.com.au for details.
